changeSet.author: savitri.n
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.ID, T1.CUSTID, T5.CUSTCIF LOVDESCCUSTCIF, T1.GSTNUMBER, T1.GSTADDRESS, T1.GSTCOUNTRY, T2.COUNTRYDESC GSTCOUNTRYLOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTSTATE, T3.CPPROVINCENAME GSTSTATELOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTCITY, T4.PCCITYNAME GSTCITYLOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTPINCODE, T1.GSTPINCODEID, T8.AREANAME GSTPINCODELOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTIN, T1.GSTINADDRESS, T1.GSTINNAME, T1.GSTDEFAULT, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.GSTADDRESS1, T1.GSTADDRESS2, T1.GSTADDRESS3, T1.GSTADDRESS4 FROM GSTDETAILS T1 LEFT JOIN BMTCOUNTRIES T2 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T2.COUNTRYCODE LEFT JOIN RMTCOUNTRYVSPROVINCE T3 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T3.CPCOUNTRY AND T1.GSTSTATE = T3.CPPROVINCE LEFT JOIN RMTPROVINCEVSCITY T4 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T4.PCCOUNTRY AND T1.GSTSTATE = T4.PCPROVINCE AND T1.GSTCITY = T4.PCCITY LEFT JOIN PINCODES T8 ON T8.PINCODEID = T1.GSTPINCODEID INNER JOIN CUSTOMERS T5 ON T5.CUSTID = T1.CUSTID

changeSet.author: savitri.n
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.ID, T1.CUSTID, T5.CUSTCIF LOVDESCCUSTCIF, T1.GSTNUMBER, T1.GSTADDRESS, T1.GSTCOUNTRY, T2.COUNTRYDESC GSTCOUNTRYLOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTSTATE, T3.CPPROVINCENAME GSTSTATELOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTCITY, T4.PCCITYNAME GSTCITYLOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTPINCODE, T1.GSTPINCODEID, T8.AREANAME GSTPINCODELOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTIN, T1.GSTINADDRESS, T1.GSTINNAME, T1.GSTDEFAULT, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.GSTADDRESS1, T1.GSTADDRESS2, T1.GSTADDRESS3, T1.GSTADDRESS4 FROM GSTDETAILS_TEMP T1 LEFT JOIN CUSTOMERS_TEMP T5 ON T1.CUSTID = T5.CUSTID LEFT JOIN BMTCOUNTRIES T2 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T2.COUNTRYCODE LEFT JOIN RMTCOUNTRYVSPROVINCE T3 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T3.CPCOUNTRY AND T1.GSTSTATE = T3.CPPROVINCE LEFT JOIN RMTPROVINCEVSCITY T4 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T4.PCCOUNTRY AND T1.GSTSTATE = T4.PCPROVINCE AND T1.GSTCITY = T4.PCCITY LEFT JOIN PINCODES T8 ON T1.GSTPINCODEID = T8.PINCODEID UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID, T1.CUSTID, T5.CUSTCIF LOVDESCCUSTCIF, T1.GSTNUMBER, T1.GSTADDRESS, T1.GSTCOUNTRY, T2.COUNTRYDESC GSTCOUNTRYLOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTSTATE, T3.CPPROVINCENAME GSTSTATELOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTCITY, T4.PCCITYNAME GSTCITYLOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTPINCODE, T1.GSTPINCODEID, T8.AREANAME GSTPINCODELOVDESCNAME, T1.GSTIN, T1.GSTINADDRESS, T1.GSTINNAME, T1.GSTDEFAULT, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.GSTADDRESS1, T1.GSTADDRESS2, T1.GSTADDRESS3, T1.GSTADDRESS4 FROM GSTDETAILS T1 LEFT JOIN CUSTOMERS T5 ON T1.CUSTID = T5.CUSTID LEFT JOIN BMTCOUNTRIES T2 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T2.COUNTRYCODE LEFT JOIN RMTCOUNTRYVSPROVINCE T3 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T3.CPCOUNTRY AND T1.GSTSTATE = T3.CPPROVINCE LEFT JOIN RMTPROVINCEVSCITY T4 ON T1.GSTCOUNTRY = T4.PCCOUNTRY AND T1.GSTSTATE = T4.PCPROVINCE AND T1.GSTCITY = T4.PCCITY LEFT JOIN PINCODES T8 ON T1.GSTPINCODEID = T8.PINCODEID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM GSTDETAILS_TEMP WHERE GSTDETAILS_TEMP.CUSTID = T1.CUSTID AND GSTDETAILS_TEMP.ID = T1.ID)

changeSet.author: savitri.n
